settings.title: Our Purpose
settings.text: Empower every person to make eco-friendly oral care choices that work for their routine, lifestyle, and health.

settings.title: Everyday oral care, reimagined
settings.text: We created a high quality, science-based oral care brand that brings together modern formats, great ingredients, and eco-friendly features that work for you and the environment

settings.title: Healthy for you + healthy for the environment
settings.text: We've built a modern day oral health brand that is eco-friendly, travel-friendly, and you-friendly.

settings.title: A new way to brush + swish
settings.text: Our new format tablets introduce a novel way to get a whole mouth clean and your freshest breath ever.

settings.title: Simple + easy + convenient

settings.title: Why change to tablets?
settings.desc: The main reason? Switching to tablet-based oral care is one of the only ways to reverse the massive sustainability challenges that have resulted from traditional oral care options. On top of that, our tablets are safe, effective, travel-friendly, convenient, modern, affordable, and fun!

settings.title: So, why eco-friendly oral care?
settings.desc: Toothpaste tubes are made from sheets of plastic laminate and aluminum that are pressed together into a single film, making them near impossible to recycle. The result? About 1 billion tubes end up in landfills, incinerators, or oceans each year. That’s enough to fill up the Empire State Building 50 times each year!

settings.title: Good for you, Good for the planet
settings.desc:
Committed to oral health

Committed to sustainability

Committed to you
settings.sub_desc: Our mission is to create high quality, science-based oral care solutions that bring together modern formats, great ingredients, and eco-friendly features to create products that are healthy for you and healthy for the environment.

settings.title: #MakingofMintly
settings.desc: A sneak peak behind the scenes of how we created Mintly :)
